info.title: Authomize API Reference
info.description:
Authomize enables users to integrate your applications with Authomize via custom connectors.

You can use the APIs described in this document to create your connector.

Once data is uploaded and processed successfully, your custom connector will function in the same way as the connectors created by Authomize.

## How does Authomize work?
Authomize works by gathering information about:

· individuals, teams and functions.

· apps, assets and accounts.

· all the relationships between them.

![img.png](https://storagetry1.blob.core.windows.net/public/78d82650-71b0-4909-8444-022aab79add5.png)

## Connector APIs

Authomize connector APIs enable pushing data into Authomize from external sources.

These APIs enable data extracted from outside applications (via application APIs) to be delivered to Authomize.

A connector processes extracted application data to transform it into a format compatible with Authomize.

![img_1.png](https://storagetry1.blob.core.windows.net/public/341bf6ef-2e5b-4284-b715-45105ffbf0f8.png)

## Authentication
To Authenticate use the API Token, with the format: `Authorization: API_Token`.

An API Token is a token you provide when making API calls. 


The API Token should be included in every request to the API in an `Authorization` header.
```
curl -v -X POST \n
     -H "Authorization: {API_Token}" \n
     ...
```

## Limits
Requests cannot exceed a size of 1MB.

get.description: Returns the user_id and tenant related to the API key and the current API version.
The Retrieve Incident API fetches a particular incident and all its details.

patch.description: The Patch Incident API updates an existing incident (based on incident ID).

post.description: The Search Incidents API lists incidents and related data.
The Post Incident Comment API adds a comment to a particular incident (based on incident ID).

get.description:
After a campaign is created it can go through several stages:
"draft", "initialization", "running", "completed", "failed", "empty" and "overdue"

Using the Retrieve Campaign API you can get details about the campaign (such as its status, the date the campaign was launched, the campaign owner and more) based on the unique campaign id.

post.description:
The Search Campaigns API is used to retrieve a list of all campaigns. 
You can filter the campaign list by status.

get.description: The Retrieve Campaign Reviewer API is used to retrieve campaign data about a specific campaign and reviewer.

post.description: The Search Campaign Permissions API gets the permissions (keep or revoke) associated with a specific campaign.

accessById.title: Accessbyid
accessById.description: Access by ID (Account or Grouping ID) that their access was reviewed.

accessByType.description: Type of entity that was reviewed, can be Account or Grouping.

accessToId.title: Accesstoid
accessToId.description: Access to ID (Asset or Grouping ID) that the access to was reviewed, for example a database the access to was reviewed.

accessToType.description: Assets or grouping that the access to was reviewed.

privilegeId.title: Privilegeid
privilegeId.description: ID of the privileges that was reviewed.

decisionReason.title: Decisionreason
decisionReason.description: Reviewer decision for keeping or revoking the reviewed access.

updatedAt.description: The date the incident was last updated.

status.description: The status of the incident (Open, In Progress, Waiting for Input, or Closed)

severity.description: The severity of the incident (Low, Medium, High or Critical).

tags.name: Incident
tags.description: The Incidents APIs enable you to pull Authomize-generated incidents from Authomize into your automated Incident Response system. Once you have responded to the incident you can use Authomize Incident APIs to update (and synchronize) the incident on Authomize.

tags.name: Campaign
tags.description:
Campaign APIs enable you to pull all the decisions from the campaign (keep or revoke) and to automate the revocation process to remove unnecessary permissions.
Campaign APIs also enable you to pull basic details on the campaigns and to pull a list of all campaigns.
